Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/Marquette
ShortDescription: Northbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, Cornell, 63rd and Stony Island, over normal route: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/Marquette.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Howard due to heavy train traffic/congestion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Howard due to heavy train traffic/congestion.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
